attributes.action: increase all tax rates to 75% of income to pay for all of parliament to take a space shuttle to the moon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We want the Prime Minister to increase all tax rates to 75% for the next 5 years so that we can pay to send all MPs including the Prime Minister to the moon aboard a space shuttle for a period of 2 weeks.

We believe this experience would change their lives and give them a new perspective on leadership.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
